# octavus-cli

CLI for validating and syncing Octavus agent definitions.

## Status

This package is under development. For the Node.js version, see [@octavus/cli](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@octavus/cli).

## Coming Soon

- `octavus sync <path>` - Sync agent to platform
- `octavus validate <path>` - Validate agent definition
- `octavus list` - List all agents
- `octavus get <slug>` - Get agent details

## Links

- [Documentation](https://octavus.ai/docs)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/octavus-ai/octavus)
